node.statement: Step 1.3.4 (Volume Conjecture connection): The exponential growth rate Vol_hyp(q) of the quantum 6j symbol is the central object of the Volume Conjecture (Kashaev 1997, Murakami-Murakami 2001): for the figure-eight knot complement, 2pi log |J_n(q)|/n -> Vol(S^3 \ K) as n -> infinity with q = exp(2pi i/n). The q-BLM model provides a physical quantum mechanical system where this exponential growth has direct dynamical consequences â€” it controls the relative weight of non-melonic Feynman diagrams and the breakdown of the 1/j perturbative expansion.
